output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF number: Yes - "CMF: 11240014" is present, indicating this is electoral propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - directly refers to George Simion, who is a presidential candidate (Poziția nr. 2 – GEORGE-NICOLAE SIMION).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - this is a paid Facebook advertisement with an estimated audience size of 500,001-1,000,000 people.
4. Electoral objective: Yes - The post clearly aims to influence voters by: - Building a narrative about George Simion's character and values - Ending with a direct call to action: "Alegeți curajul, demnitatea, omul care luptă pentru limba noastră" - Using emotionally charged language and patriotic themes
5. Journalism: No - This is a personal endorsement and campaign message, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: While it contains personal experiences, it's structured as campaign material with a clear electoral objective and includes a CMF number.
This is clearly electoral propaganda being run after the conclusion of the presidential campaign period, which ended on November 23, 2024, at 7:00.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Has clear electoral messaging - Is a paid advertisement - Reaches a wide audience - Contains direct call to action for voting
conclusion.message-for-police: Voga Design & Architecture, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala (ID postare Facebook: 4091020691135777) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Postarea, care include numar CMF 11240014, promoveaza direct candidatul GEORGE-NICOLAE SIMION, folosind mesaje cu caracter electoral explicit ("Alegeți curajul, demnitatea, omul care luptă pentru limba noastră") si este difuzata ca reclama platita pe Facebook dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu potential de expunere intre 500,001 si 1,000,000 de utilizatori.
